pageContext.description: Dimensions: max dim. 37.5mm; max. T. rim 1.5; min T flat rim 1.1; min. T. rim 0.5; Wt. 4.4 g,Typology: two edges and rounded apex between with neat flat side; remaining edge irreg. but as cast; plate thickness towards flattened rims.,Manufacture: series of hmks. of different sizes on one face, causing the central thinning to some extent at least; underside with hints of striation - may have been grmks.,Condition: apex bent at slight angle, no breakage evident along the irreg. edge.
pageContext.surface: Dull brown-gold surface with occasional pocks or green corrosion lumps.
pageContext.collection: Gibson, Mr. D. J. - private (4),115 Hurstcourt Road, Sutton, Surrey
pageContext.remarks: PIF; AFI; DF(S); SI; CI; Rec: SN Dec. 79; Source: Sb. A.; Sub. Inf.: via Jon Cotton (W. London F.U.) March 79
